level.text: When used in this chapter, the following terms and phrases shall have the meanings ascribed:
Demolition – the total removal of the existing structure.
Discontinuance of an existing building – disallowance of further use of the building, and all services to the building are terminated without necessarily demolishing the building.
Property associated with the street and alley closing – property that is or will be included in a development or developments requiring the closing of the street or alley.
Retail tenant – a nonresidential tenant offering goods or nonprofessional services.
Substantial rehabilitation – the alteration of a building wherein existing tenants would be required to move.
